tags.name: editable-table-display
tags.description:
`editable-table-display`
`An editor interface for editable-table

Events:

  * `change` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `csv-downloaded` {`CustomEvent<{ table: this; data: string; filename: string; }>`} - Fires when transcript is printed

  * `table-printed` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - Fires when transcript is printed

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ attribute: string; custom: string; element: this; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - 

  * `responsive-element-deleted` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `filter-column` {`number`} - Index of current filter column

  * `filter-case-sensitive` {`boolean`} - whether filter is case sensitive

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether table is filtered

  * `filter-text` {`string`} - Text for Filtering

  * `selected` {`number`} - Selected column to display when in responsive mode

  * `sort-mode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sort-column` {`number`} - Index of current sort column

  * `filter-contains` {`boolean`} - whether column only needs to contain filter text
instead of default requiriwhich requires an exact match

  * `caption` {`string`} - a table caption

  * `csv-data` {`string`} - Raw data pulled in from csv file.

  * `column-header` {`boolean`} - Display first row as a column header.

  * `data` {`any[]`} - raw data

  * `footer` {`boolean`} - Display last row as a column footer.

  * `row-header` {`boolean`} - Display first column as a row header.

  * `data-csv` {`string`} - Location of CSV file.

  * `responsive-width` {`number`} - width in pixels

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - size for responsive styling: xs, sm, md, lg, xl

  * `sm` {`number`} - Miniumum value for small breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Miniumum value for medium breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Miniumum value for large breakpoint

  * `xl` {`number`} - Miniumum value for extra-large breakpoint

  * `disable-responsive` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `filterColumn` {`number`} - Index of current filter column

  * `filterCaseSensitive` {`boolean`} - whether filter is case sensitive

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether table is filtered

  * `filterText` {`string`} - Text for Filtering

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Hides table if it has no data

  * `options` {`{ alt: never; value: number; }[][]`} - Gets columns in `<thead>`

  * `selected` {`number`} - Selected column to display when in responsive mode

  * `sortMode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sortColumn` {`number`} - Index of current sort column

  * `filterContains` {`boolean`} - whether column only needs to contain filter text
instead of default requiriwhich requires an exact match

  * `_observer` - 

  * `caption` {`string`} - a table caption

  * `csvData` {`string`} - Raw data pulled in from csv file.

  * `thead` {`any[]`} - Rows in <thead>

  * `tbody` {`any[]`} - Rows in <tbody>

  * `tfoot` {`any[]`} - Rows in <tfoot>

  * `columnHeader` {`boolean`} - Display first row as a column header.

  * `downloadable` {`boolean`} - 

  * `data` {`any[]`} - raw data

  * `filter` {`boolean`} - 

  * `footer` {`boolean`} - Display last row as a column footer.

  * `rowHeader` {`boolean`} - Display first column as a row header.

  * `sort` {`boolean`} - 

  * `dataCsv` {`string`} - Location of CSV file.

  * `responsiveWidth` {`number`} - width in pixels

  * `responsiveSize` {`string`} - size for responsive styling: xs, sm, md, lg, xl

  * `sm` {`number`} - Miniumum value for small breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Miniumum value for medium breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Miniumum value for large breakpoint

  * `xl` {`number`} - Miniumum value for extra-large breakpoint

  * `disableResponsive` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: editable-table-editor-rowcol
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-rowcol`
A header label and menu for inserting and deleting a row or a column of editable-table interface (editable-table.html).

Events:

  * `rowcol-action` {`CustomEvent<{ insert: boolean; row: any; index: number; }>`} - 

  * `rowcol-menuopen` {`CustomEvent<{ insert: any; row: any; index: any; }>`} - 

  * `close` {`CustomEvent<Event>`} - Fires when menu is closed

  * `open` {`CustomEvent<Event>`} - Fires when menu is opened

  * `item-click` {`CustomEvent<Event>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `index` {`number`} - Index of row or column

  * `row` {`boolean`} - Whether menu button controls a row

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `__menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `position-align` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

Properties:

  * `index` {`number`} - Index of row or column

  * `row` {`boolean`} - Whether menu button controls a row

  * `controls` {`string`} - Gets first cell that menu controls

  * `label` - Gets row or column label based on type

  * `labelInfo` {`TemplateResult`} - get cell label

  * `type` {`"Row" | "Column"`} - Gets row or column type

  * `currentItem` - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `expanded` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `hovered` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

  * `menuTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - template for dropdown menu

  * `buttonTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - template for button

  * `listItemTemplate` {`TemplateResult`} - template for slotted list items

  * `keyCode` {`{ TAB: number; RETURN: number; ESC: number; SPACE: number; PAGEUP: number; PAGEDOWN: number; END: number; HOME: number; LEFT: number; UP: number; RIGHT: number; DOWN: number; }`} - key code translations as object

  * `__menuItems` {`any[]`} - menu items in array form to move from prev to next

  * `position` {`string`} - Positions list to top, right, bottom, left of its content.

  * `positionAlign` {`string`} - Aligns list at start, or end fo target. Default is centered.

  * `offset` {`number`} - spacing between top of list and menu button

tags.name: editable-table-editor-toggle
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-toggle`
A toggle button for an property in editable-table interface (editable-table.html).

Events:

  * `change` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `controls` {`string`} - Table id for accessibility

  * `id` {`string`} - Button id that matches table property to toggle

  * `icon` {`string`} - Button icon

  * `label` {`string`} - Button label

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

Properties:

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `controls` {`string`} - Table id for accessibility

  * `id` {`string`} - Button id that matches table property to toggle

  * `icon` {`string`} - Button icon

  * `label` {`string`} - Button label

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Whether button is toggled

attributes.description:
`disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

Property: disabled

Default: false

Default: table

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether column is filtered

  * `text` {`string`} - Column header text

Properties:

  * `columnIndex` {`number`} - Index of column

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether column is filtered

  * `text` {`string`} - Column header text

tags.name: editable-table-sort
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-sort`
A column header that functions as a three-state sort button (no sort, sort ascending, sort descending) for table-editor-display mode (table-editor-display.html).

Events:

  * `change-sort-mode` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `column-index` {`number`} - Sort ascending, descending or none

  * `sort-mode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sort-column` {`number`} - Index of current sort column

Properties:

  * `columnIndex` {`number`} - Sort ascending, descending or none

  * `sorting` {`boolean`} - Whether column is being sorted

  * `sortMode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sortColumn` {`number`} - Index of current sort column

Property: columnIndex

Property: sortMode

Default: none

attributes.description:
`sort-column` {`number`} - Index of current sort column

Property: sortColumn

Default: -1
